DOC.brief_summary: Investigate the efficacy and safety of DS-5565 in subjects with Diabetic Peripheral Neuropathic Pain (DPNP) in comparison to placebo
DOC.brief_title: DS-5565 Phase III Study for Diabetic Peripheral Neuropathic Pain
DOC.detailed_description: [Double Blind Phase] The primary objective is to compare change in the Average Daily Pain Score(ADPS) from baseline to Week 14 in Asian subjects with DPNP receiving DS-5565 versus placebo. [Open Extension Phase] The objective is to assess the long-term safety and efficacy of DS-5565 in subjects with DPNP.
DOC.criteria: Type 1 or type 2 diabetes mellitus at screening Painful distal symmetric polyneuropathy At screening, a pain scale of â‰¥ 40 mm HbA1c (National Glycohemoglobin Standardization Program) > 10.0%
